name: tojs-styleguide
displayName: Toronto JS - Brand Manual & Style Guide
description: The Toronto JS Brand Manual & Style Guide is a living document that describes the style we use at Toronto JS. It is intended to be a reference for current and future contributors to the Toronto JS community who wish to develop or create anything using Toronto JS branding.

scripts.lint: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.build:icons-transparent: pwa-asset-generator build/logo.html --type png --maskable false --icon-only --scrape false --dark-mode --opaque false --log false public/icons/transparent
scripts.build:icons-maskable: pwa-asset-generator build/logo.html --type png --maskable false --icon-only --log false public/icons/maskable
scripts.build:assets: npm run build:icons-transparent && npm run build:icons-maskable && npm run build:splash
